titles.title: Child Safety and Home Security Act of 2009

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for a nonrefundable tax credit against income tax for individuals who purchase a residential safe storage device for the safe storage of firearms.
Child Safety and Home Security Act of 2009

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Child Safety and Home Security Act of 2009 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide for a nonrefundable tax credit for the purchase of a residential safe storage device to secure firearms. Prohibits the creation of a database identifying gun owners using information from tax returns on which the credit under this Act is claimed.
